name: clara-viz-widgets
description: A Jupyter Widget for interactive rendering with Clara Viz.
author: Andreas Heumann

scripts.prepublish: yarn run clean && yarn run build:prod
scripts.checkversion: if [ ${CLARA_VIZ_VERSION} != $(node -p "require('./package.json').version") ]; then echo "### Version mismatch, please update package.json version. ###"; exit -1; fi;
scripts.build: yarn run checkversion && webpack --mode=development && yarn run build:labextension:dev
scripts.build:prod: yarn run checkversion && webpack --mode=production && yarn run build:labextension
